definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: I need to get a new email account.
sentences.chinese: 我需要申请一个新的电子信箱。

sentences.english: A quotation mark is not acceptable in an email address.
sentences.chinese: 在电子信箱位址上，引号不被允许的。

sentences.english: So, I wonder whether you could let me know your email or not.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果可以的话，请告诉我，您的电子信箱。

sentences.english: Then he started opening his email.
The files will then be sent to you by email in PDF format.
sentences.chinese: 相关文件将以PDF格式发送到您的电子信箱中。

sentences.english: I want to check my E-mail.
sentences.chinese: 我想检查我的电子信箱。

sentences.english: Yahoo Email is updating it's system.
sentences.chinese: 奇摩电子信箱近期持续更新系统功能。

sentences.english: Spam is unwanted sales messages sent to your electronic mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾你不想要的讯息发到你的电子信箱。

definition: email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
